mapper.select: select x,y from current_coordinate where user_id=#{userId}

select water_piece.*, maps.x as x, maps.y as y from user_map left join maps on user_map.map_id = maps.id left join water_piece on maps.cate = water_piece.cate where user_map.user_id=#{userId} order by maps.x,maps.y
mapper.update: update current_coordinate set x=#{x},y=#{y} where user_id=#{userId}
